title: Elon Musk begins mass layoffs at Twitter
description: Musk is laying off broad swaths of the company's workforce. An internal email said employees would be notified by Friday and Twitter's offices would be closed.

title: NASCAR driver says his video-game-like move could’ve been ‘really stupid’
description: "My move last weekend would’ve seemed really stupid if it didn’t succeed," said Ross Chastain, whose stunt helped him advance to a championship race.

title: How ‘League of Legends’ made its first proudly gay, Black champion
description: "I wanted to see a character like me in a video game for so long," said one of the designers behind K’Sante, "League's" newest legend.

title: ‘Marvel Snap’ will let you play against friends this year
description: An update containing a friend-centric battle mode is set to release “this calendar year,” the game's developer told The Washington Post.

title: ‘God of War Ragnarok’ improves on its predecessor in every way
description: It's a bigger, faster, gorier and more narratively rewarding iteration of the 2018 smash hit.

title: Twitter employees await the ax in a new culture of secrecy and fear
description: Silence from new leaders has bewildered workers, who are turning to private chats, anonymous apps and Elon Musk’s tweets for basic information.

title: iPads have a new way to multitask, but it’s not very intuitive
description: New software for some of Apple’s high-powered iPad models promise to make them better machines for multitasking. The reality isn't that simple.

title: Who’s going, who’s staying, who (could be) back on Elon Musk’s Twitter
description: A few celebrities have said they will leave the service, but there has not been a high-profile exodus.
